responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I can suggest you best places to visit during respective seasons, Guide you with travelling precautions and safety, Recommed beautiful waterfalls and temples.

patterns: which place is best for summer?
which place is better for a summer vacation?
responses: Summer means happy times and good sunshine. The best places to visit during Summer season: Ooty, Kodaikanal, Lonavala, Munnar, Lambasingi

suggest a good place to travel in rainy season

patterns: what are the famous temples in india?
suggest some good temples in india
responses: A temple visit is more than just a physical experience; it is a soleful journey that rejuvernates our spirit. There are few very famour temples: Shree Somanath Jyothirling temple located in Gujarat, Rameshwaram temple located in Tamil Nadu, Shree Padbhanabhaswamy temple located in Kerala, Ranganathaswamy temple located in Tiruchirapalli Tamil Nadu, Bhadrachalam located in Telangana, Dwaraka located in Gujarat

patterns: what are the tourist attractions in india?
best places to visit in india
responses: To other countries, I may go as a tourist, but to India, I come as a pilgrim ~MARTIN LUTHER KING. JR. Beautiful places to visit in India: Taj Mahal, Gate Way of India, Amber Palace, Hawa Mahal, Mysore Palace, Red Fort, Ajanta Caves

Go with the flow. Force nothing. Let it happen- trusting that whichever way it goes. It's for the best. Amazing Waterfalls to visit: Dudhsagarfalls, Hebbefalls, Athirapallyfalls, Jogfalls, Talakonafalls, Kunchikalfalls, Shivanasamudrafalls

patterns: what should i carry while travelling?
what to take with me in travel?
responses: Better a thousand times careful than once dead. Please make sure you carry these things along with you: Necessary Medicines, Atleast a pair of extra clothes, Sunscreen, Add important phone numbers to your emergency list, Reusable waterbottle, Sunglasses, Cash

patterns: how to take care of myself while travelling?
